data.name: MLOps NYC19
data.description: The MLOps NYC conference focuses on managing and automating machine learning pipelines, to bring data science into business applications with Kubeflow, AI, serverless, pipeline automation and GPU acceleration.

relatedRecords.description: On the 8th of April 2020 the Global AI Community is hosting a 30 hour live event across timezones in different languages. Mark the date in your calender, subscribe to our YouTube channel and tune in.
